Articles.Content:
Hi KSP'ers, I need help with the rocket parts on the extraplanetary launchpads mod. How do I get the rocket to build? I have enough rocket parts, and I click build and nothing happens. Do I need to be in space for it to work?

Edited November 29, 2014 by vsully

The best places to ask for support with a mod are:

a) that mod's thread

support (modded installs)

c) gameplay questions

But that's a popular enough mod that someone should come along with more useful answers soon. In the meantime, so you know you're not being ignored, http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59545?p=1233759&viewfull=1#post1233759 might help.
Thanks it works now, though my first attempt it took all day to build an stock replica of the Mercury-Redstone.
